channel.title: Holiday Items
channel.description:
What are you thoughts on holiday items? Should they introduced..
I feel that all of the holidays should be redone. We all know that party hats are going to be collected so what's the point? I believe everyone should be able to obtain these items from diango in draynor and free to everybody.

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

RuneScape

RuneScape Forum - Community Forums for Clans, Feedback & Discussion

Join the discussion on the official RuneScape forum. Share your thoughts with the community, ask questions, find help, learn about events and much more.

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:15, topic:506779”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=625011.msg4255916#msg4255916 date=1362768736]

Just follow the seasons from the start. If I recall, wasn’t phats or Santa first?

October 2001 - Pumpkins
December 2001 - Christmas crackers
March 2002 - Easter eggs
October 2002 - Halloween masks
December 2002 - Santa’s hats

Perfect, October is the next holiday
[/quote]October is a holiday?[/quote]
oh forgot easter, i don’t celebrate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

the elve age:

I disagree, they had a very high value that could only be achieved through great success or good luck.

That’s all it would be in your method, great luck. It would be unfair to other players who never had a chance to get them.

Read full topic

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

I don’t even see rares as a form of accomplishment… Or milestone, or anything. They never were. Let everyone have their choice of rare, gg, who cares

Read full topic

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I think they should exclusively drop them on different worlds, so that they can have some type of monetary value. If everyone had them, they wouldn’t have the same feel.

Read full topic

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

RSCShadow:

I think they should just start from the early RS2 holiday events. I don’t really care about tradeable ones.

I agree with you.

Read full topic

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

From what I’ve read, in RS2 they pretty much wanted every player to have a chance at getting the holiday items, I don’t really see a reason why they shouldn’t keep doing that.

Read full topic

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

They still should have some significance to the game, as them being available to all would simply deprive those items of their superiority over other items.

Read full topic

item.title: Holiday Items
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

They should still do holiday events and just give away the rares there. Like you said, they won’t be worth much but it would be fun for the players to get them and maybe eventually they will be worth something again.

Read full topic
